name: ✍️ Font Module
description: Definition of a font as a page module.

elements.helpText: Font family for the font in question.
elements.label: Font Family

elements.helpText: Reference a shared page contribution to be included in the "head" section of the page.

elements.helpText: Reference a shared page contribution to be included in the "body" section of the page.
